Uses of Interface
org.strongback.components.Gyroscope

  • Packages that use Gyroscope 
    Package Description
    org.strongback.components
    This package defines a set of components that mirror real actuator, sensors, and other devices.
    org.strongback.hardware  

    • Uses of Gyroscope in org.strongback.components

      Methods in org.strongback.components that return Gyroscope 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Gyroscope Gyroscope.create(DoubleSupplier angleSupplier, DoubleSupplier rateSupplier)
      Create a gyroscope for the given functions that returns the angular displacement and velocity.
      Gyroscope TalonSRX.getAnalogInput()
      Get the current analog angle and rate, regardless of whether it is the current feedback device.
      Gyroscope TalonSRX.getEncoderInput()
      Get the current encoder angle and rate, regardless of whether it is the current feedback device.
      Gyroscope TalonSRX.getSelectedSensor()
      Get the input angle and rate of the current feedback device.
      default Gyroscope Gyroscope.zero() 

    • Uses of Gyroscope in org.strongback.hardware

      Methods in org.strongback.hardware that return Gyroscope 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Gyroscope Hardware.AngleSensors.gyroscope(Gyro gyro)
      Create a Gyroscope that uses the provided WPILib Gyro.
      static Gyroscope Hardware.AngleSensors.gyroscope(int channel)
      Create a Gyroscope that uses a WPILib AnalogGyro on the specified channel.
      static Gyroscope Hardware.AngleSensors.gyroscope(SPI.Port port)
      Create a Gyroscope that uses a WPILib ADXRS450_Gyro on the specified SPI bus port.
